description: The measurement obtained during execution of work master (defined in Part 4 of this standard) shall be presented as a property measurement. A property measurement reports the measurement obtained for a single testable object property corresponding to an evaluated property of a test specification for a specific person, equipment, physical asset, material lot or material sublot
title: Property measurement
$comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.02-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 2: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

links.dtdl:description: The testable object property ID for which this property measurement is records the measurement result
The work master ID or work directive ID which is applied test method to obtain the measurement of this property measurement for test specification of the testable object property ID

links.dtdl:name: description
links.dtdl:description: Additional information about the property measurement

measurementDate.title: Measurement date
measurementDate.description: The date and time when the measurement was obtained

value.title: Value
value.description: The measured value for the testable object property

valueUnitOfMeasure.title: Value unit of measure
valueUnitOfMeasure.description: The unit of measure of the measured value, if applicable

expiration.title: Expiration
expiration.description: The date of the expiration of the property measurement
